original_title: Two killed, 23 injured in two accidents at Polonnaruwa and Embilipitiya
original_body_lines: Two people were killed and eight others injured following an accident involving a truck and a tractor at Walekade Junction in Polonnaruwa this evening.
Police said at least 10 people were travelling in the tractor when it collided with the truck.
Two women who were travelling in the tractor died in the accident.
Meanwhile, at least 15 persons were injured when a cab and van collided on the Ratnapura- Embilipitiya main road at the 98th mile post.
Police said the cab was taking a u-turn on the road when the van travelling towards Embilipitiya crashed on to the cab and toppled.
Police said the motorcyclist and 14 others in the van were admitted to the Embilipitiya Hospital.
The driver of the cab had fled the scene following the accident and investigations are under way to apprehend him.
